snippet: The former track cycling star Taylor Phinney will return to the Olympics on the road, and Kristin Armstrong will defend her gold medal in the women’s time trial at the London Games.
abstract: Former track cycling star Taylor Phinney will return to the Olympics on the road, and Kristin Armstrong will defend her gold medal in the women’s time trial at the London Games; they are among 21 riders announced by USA Cycling for the Summer Olympics; other cycling news noted.
lead_paragraph: The former track cycling star Taylor Phinney will return to the Olympics on the road, and Kristin Armstrong will defend her gold medal in the women’s time trial at the London Games.
